DOC.brief_summary: This study double-blind randomized clinical trial two arm aim study effect diaphragmatic treatment patient nonspecific low back pain . Low back pain great importance today 's society , therefore important develop effective treatment condition . People chronic nonspecific low back pain , present respiratory disorder get anxiety state , affect mainly diaphragm muscle . Therefore , give direct anatomic relationship , diaphragm may part development chronic low back pain . Although clinical practice guideline chronic low back pain developed , n't explore physiotherapy treatment especially aim diaphragmatic treatment . A double-blind randomized clinical trial two arm use purpose , 64 patient nonspecific low back pain refer different hospital Castellón randomize two group : - Diaphragmatic intervention osteopathic manual therapy treatment ( D ) . - Diaphragmatic intervention placebo treatment group ( P ) . An osteopathic manual therapy protocol treatment back pain include technique diaphragm muscle apply patient group D , total 5 session . For patient group P , protocol perform diaphragm placebo treatment technique . The study focus analysis follow variable : score questionnaire : - Pain : McGill Pain Questionnaire VAS ( Visual Analogical Scale ) . - Fear Avoidance : ( FABQ ) - Disability : Oswestry Disability Index Roland-Morris - Anxiety : HADS : ( Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ) - Catastropizing : PCS ( Pain Catastropizing Scale ) - Satisfaction treatment ( Escala de Satisfacción con el tratamiento ) The result pre-intervention post-intervention variable compare two group first session , fourth session first third month first intervention . The VAS score also assess second third session .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Diaphragmatic Manual Therapy Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: low back pain 3 month vertebra fracture systemic disease spinal surgery degenerative articular disease acute soft tissue inflammation radiculopathy structural spine deformity pregnancy mental disease dermatologic disease rejection manual contact
